title: HACKED
body:
hello  riot 
i just wanna say that my account got hacked and he went ranked game and trolled and became so racist  and when i log in i saw him in game and i spectate and recorded the game and after that i tried so till the people that it wasn't me but they reported me and i got 14 days ban can i talk to you guys or any thing ???? and can i get my account back please if you need from me to send for you the clip if you want 2

replies.body: Oh wow, that sucks that you had to watch someone else use your account and being negative. Reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll be able to help make sure your account is secured.
